content: + tutorial 1 a modern take on the classic granny square turned into a practical tote bag in 3 different sizes - mini midi & maxi this pattern is very versatile and easily adjustable to the preferred dimensions feel free to experiment skill **easy** approx time **1 5 5 hours** depending on the size **materials** - yarnart jeans 1-4 skeins - weight 2 cotton/acrylic blend 145 - 500 m or 160 - 560 yds - 3 mm crochet hook - yarn needle scissors **stitches and techniques used** **magic_ring** - magic_ring **single_crochet** - single_crochet **half_double_crochet** - half_double_crochet **double_crochet** - double_crochet **stsc** - stacked single_crochet 1 https //youtu be/4c1govnzxse si=juinddcbhtwbmmmi
